channel.title: Run Error
channel.description:
while adding tutorial island to my 377 today i did everything right except when i try and run the server this error comes up Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "945 3095 3 108 0 1 1 3 3 Runescape Guide" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:65) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:492) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:527) at server.game.npcs.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2297) at server.game.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:34) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:72) Press any key to continue . . .
yes i did read the error and tried fixing it but i cant seem to figure out the problem :( please help me skype-santino.roma69

item.title: Run Error
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Have you made sure it’s matching the other spawns formats?

Read full topic

item.title: Run Error

item.description:

/*Tutorial Island*/ spawn = 945 3095 3108 0 1 1 3 3 Runescape Guide spawn = 943 3104 3095 0 1 1 3 3 Survival Expert spawn = 942 3076 3085 0 1 1 3 3 Master Chef spawn = 949 3086 3122 0 1 1 3 3 Quest Guide spawn = 948 3081 9504 0 1 1 3 3 Mining Instructor spawn = 944 3104 9506 0 1 1 3 3 Combat Instructor spawn = 947 3127 3124 0 1 1 3 3 Financial Advisor spawn = 954 3124 3107 0 1 1 3 3 Brother Brace spawn = 946 3140 3085 0 1 1 3 3 Financial Advisor spawn = 87 3105 9514 0 1 1 3 3 giant rat spawn = 87 3105 9517 0 1 1 3 3 giant rat spawn = 87 3106 9514 0 1 1 3 3 giant rat spawn = 87 3104 9514 0 1 1 3 3 giant rat spawn = 87 3105 9519 0 1 1 3 3 giant rat spawn = 87 3109 9516 0 1 1 3 3 giant rat spawn = 87 3108 9520 0 1 1 3 3 giant rat spawn = 87 3102 9517 0 1 1 3 3 giant rat spawn = 316 3102 3093 0 0 1 3 3 fishing spot

item.title: Run Error
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Wrapping in code tags around a section of code make people more liable to help you, as it’s easier to read.
As for your problem, you typed something wrong with, “945 3095 3108 0 1 1 3 3 Runescape Guide”. It’s most likely a syntax error, can you post the file that includes that bit of code, wrap it in code tags this time

Read full topic

item.title: Run Error
item.dc:creator: @master_roshi master roshi
item.description:
@master_roshi wrote:

while adding tutorial island to my 377 today i did everything right except when i try and run the server this error comes up
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “945 3095 3
108 0 1 1 3 3 Runescape Guide”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.
java:65)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:492)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:527)
at server.game.npcs.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2297)
at server.game.npcs.NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:34)
at server.Server.(Server.java:72)
Press any key to continue . . .

yes i did read the error and tried fixing it but i cant seem to figure out the problem please help me
skype-santino.roma69
